transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Start as string,
		End as string,
		Value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Start as string,
		End as string,
		Value as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(DateHour = toTimestamp(toString(byName('Date'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') + ' ' + toString(byName('Start')) + ':00.000'),
		Value_DC = Value,
		DateHour_DC_KEY = left(toString(byName('Date'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') + ' ' + toString(byName('Start')), 13)) ~> MapDrifted1
source2 derive(DateHour_HFPC = toTimestamp(toString(byName('Date'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') + ' ' + toString(byName('Start')) + ':00.000'),
		Value_HFPC = Value,
		DateHour_HFPC_KEY = left(toString(byName('Date'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') + ' ' + toString(byName('Start')), 13)) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		DateHour,
		Value_DC,
		DateHour_DC_KEY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
MapDrifted2 select(mapColumn(
		DateHour_HFPC,
		Value_HFPC,
		DateHour_HFPC_KEY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns2
RemoveColumns2, RemoveColumns1 join(DateHour_HFPC_KEY == DateHour_DC_KEY,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(Calulation = (toDouble(byName('Value_HFPC'))  * toDouble(byName('Value_DC')))/4000) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
